mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products ( account_id, name, price, category, stock, is_stopped, description, image_pass, created_date, updated_date ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{category}, #{stock}, #{isStopped}, #{description}, #{imagePass}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT products.id AS id, products.account_id AS account_id, accounts.name AS account_name, products.name AS product_name, products.price AS price, products.category AS category, products.stock AS stock, products.is_stopped AS is_stopped, products.description AS description, products.image_pass AS image_pass FROM products INNER JOIN accounts ON accounts.id = products.account_id WHERE products.id = #{id}
